original_title: Spinetta. Discos esenciales: Pelusón of milk
overview: Directed by Mono Fontana, a key Spinetta album is recreated: Pelusón of milk, with a band of historic musicians from El Flaco and three guest singers: Natalia Pellegrinet, Roma Vayone and Florencia Ruiz. The concert is part of the cycle Luis Alberto Spinetta: Essential Discs, dedicated to revisiting his productions that left a mark on the collective memory.  Pianist and keyboardist Mono Fontana, one of the most original musicians in Argentine music and a key player in various Spinetta projects, directs a group made up of Claudio Cardone on keyboards, Guillermo Arrom and Bruno Marchetti on guitars, César Franov on bass and Sergio Verdinelli on drums.  Recorded in 1991, the album brings together compositions such as "Continue living without your love", "Lago de forma mía", "Ganges", "Domo tu", "La montana", "Cielo de ti" and " Hombre de lata", among other creations of Skinny. Both Mono Fontana and Arrom and Cardone participated in the original recording of Pelusón of milk.
